Name: PURGE FORCE 2070
About the game: In 1960, the first station Sputnik 986 was launched into space and since then it has been constantly expanded. Now, in 2070, the station is under attack. The Sputnik 986 space station is under attack by alien life forms. You and your team are part of the cleanup team that is supposed to rid the station of the alien. Secure and clear the station from the aliens. Experience 13 exciting missions alone or in co-op with up to 3 friends. Collect various weapons and use your skills to eliminate the enemies. Use the abilities like shield, people or self firing. Play through the whole game either alone or play the game with up to 3 friends. Use your weapons and skills together and complete the 13 missions.
